item.title: What Is Prayer?
item.description: [P]rayer is a retirement from earth and a retreat from our fellow creatures to fix our attention on God and communicate with Him who dwells in heaven. ~ Isaac Watts - A Guide to Prayer What is Prayer? The most basic and robust definition I can think of is: Prayer is talking to God.1 I would like to break this phrase down to better explain myself. Let’s start with the phrase “talking to”.
